title: Young Professionals for Social Justice Mixer: Fueling NYC’s Movement for Affordable Housing
desc: Want to connect with other young professionals who are committed to social justice? Wondering how to leverage your skills and resources to support social movements? Join us! North Star Fund  is hosting a networking mixer for young professionals who care about social justice. We?re young people in finance, tech, law, philanthropy, and other professional fields coming together to support grassroots social movements in New York City. Come to meet like-minded peers and learn more about how to support the local movement for housing justice. Activists involved with North Star?s  Housing Now Fund  will offer insights into New York City?s housing crisis, and share ideas for how young professionals can leverage their skills, networks, and resources to support efforts to make New York City an affordable city for all.
